body:
Hi Everyone At Avicus,

So I was thinking about applying to become a staff member but I wasnt sure how/when/could I do this.

Any answers (especially from ranks and staff) would be greatly appreciated 
thanks,


Bink26
body_tagged:

title: Staff Applications

replies.body: I also found the same problem. Sorry no help from me
replies.body_tagged: I also found the same problem. Sorry no help from me

replies.body: They are not open yet, but they will be soon!
replies.body_tagged: They are not open yet, but they will be soon!

replies.body:
Cool but thanks for the input (i'm glad its not just me who is struggling)

Also there is nothing about it in the staff applications section in the rest of the forum.
replies.body_tagged:
Cool but thanks for the input (i'm glad its not just me who is struggling)

Also there is nothing about it in the staff applications section in the rest of the forum.

replies.body: Okay but I want to know exactly when and how
replies.body_tagged: Okay but I want to know exactly when and how

replies.body:
You can apply for staff here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3 when applications re-open.

They are expected to re-open in July.
replies.body_tagged:
You can apply for staff here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3 when applications re-open.

They are expected to re-open in July.

replies.body: There is no set date but I think it is either this month or next.They will make a section to apply in and a format to follow when applying. Don't worry now.
replies.body_tagged: There is no set date but I think it is either this month or next.They will make a section to apply in and a format to follow when applying. Don't worry now.
